set2.ques: 1. Which of the following variable declaration would not compiled in a java program
set2.exp: The syntax of variable in java is < datatype variablename; >

set2.A: Same name as the class it is declared within

set2.exp: JVM (Java Virtual Machine) is an abstract machine. It is a specification that provides runtime environment in which java bytecode can be executed.

set2.ques: 4. What is byte code in context of Java
set2.A: The type of code generated by Java compiler
set2.exp: Java use compiler and interpreter both where compiler translate java code into byte code and interpreter translate byte code into binray code.
set2.B: Code generated by Java virtual machine
set2.C: Another name of Java source file

set2.ques: 5. The Java run time system automatically calls this method while garbage collection
set2.exp: ‘finalize()’ method is automatically called by the java compiler before destroying the object to free any resources.

set2.A: with same method but different types of parameters
set2.exp: Overloading method to declear multiple function with same name but use different number of argument.
set2.C: method name may be same or different

set2.ques: 7. A protected member can be accessed in
set2.exp: Protected data member and method are only accessible by the classes of the same package and the subclasses present in any package.

set2.ques: 8. All exception types are sub classes of the built in class in
set2.exp: All Exception types are subclasses of the built-in class Throwable. Exception is used for exceptional conditions that user program should catch.

set2.ques: 9. In Java , objects are passed as
set2.exp: Objects are passed by call by reference refers to passing the real reference of the variable in memory.

set2.ques: 10. Which of following not a component of Java IDE
set2.exp: An integrated development environment (IDE) is a software application that provides comprehensive facilities to computer programmers for software development.

set2.exp: Variable name always starts with letters.

set2.D: Applet viewer tool which comes with JDK

set2.exp: The Java compiler (javac) converts the source code into bytecode.

set3.ques: 1. The process that focuses on only important characteristics is known as:
set3.exp: The insulation of data from direct access by the program is called as the data abstraction.Data abstraction also called as data hiding, is the mechanism where by the code and the data it manipulates are wrapped into a single unit.

set3.ques: 2. Which statement is true regarding an object: –
set3.A: An object is of a class
set3.exp: An object is an instance of class.
set3.B: An object is an instance of a class
set3.D: An object is not an instance of class

set3.ques: 3. An object-oriented programming composition relates to
set3.A: The use of consistent coding convection
set3.exp: Composition is about an object that is made up of other objects, referred as “containment. Composition implies that the life cycles are more strongly linked, that means Whole is responsible for the life time of Part.
set3.B: In refers to coherent, common, behavior

set3.ques: 4. In object-oriented programming a new classes can be defined by extending existing classes
set3.exp: Inheritance is a mechanism that enables one class to inherit all of the behaviour (methods ) and attributes (instance variables) of another class.
